hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin might decrease the anticoagulant effect of acenocoumarol. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   might   decrease   the anticoagulant effect of   acenocoumarol .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Atazanavir boosted with ritonavir increases the exposure to rifabutin. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Atazanavir   boosted with ritonavir   increases   the exposure to   rifabutin .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin slightly decreases the exposure to atovaquone. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   slightly   decreases   the exposure to   atovaquone .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin has been reported to cause neutropenia when given with azithromycin. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   has been reported to   cause   neutropenia when given with   azithromycin .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin slightly decreases the exposure to bictegravir. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   slightly   decreases   the exposure to   bictegravir .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin is predicted to decrease the exposure to cabazitaxel. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   is predicted to   decrease   the exposure to   cabazitaxel .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin has been reported to cause a small decrease in the exposure to cabotegravir. Manufacturer advises avoid intramuscular cabotegravir.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   has been reported to   cause a small decrease in   the exposure to   cabotegravir .  Manufacturer advises avoid intramuscular  cabotegravir .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin decreases the concentration of clarithromycin and clarithromycin increases the concentration of rifabutin. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   decreases   the concentration of   clarithromycin  and  clarithromycin   increases   the concentration of   rifabutin .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin decreases the concentration of cobicistat and cobicistat increases the exposure to rifabutin. Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   decreases   the concentration of   cobicistat  and  cobicistat   increases   the exposure to   rifabutin .  Manufacturer advises avoid or adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin is predicted to decrease the efficacy of combined hormonal contraceptives. For FSRH guidance, see Contraceptives, interactions.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   is predicted to   decrease   the efficacy of   combined hormonal contraceptives .  For FSRH guidance, see  Contraceptives, interactions .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin is predicted to decrease the efficacy of cyproterone with ethinylestradiol (co-cyprindiol). Manufacturer advises use alternative methods during treatment with, and for 28 days after, the enzyme inducing drug is stopped.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   is predicted to   decrease   the efficacy of   cyproterone   with ethinylestradiol (co-cyprindiol) .  Manufacturer advises use alternative methods during treatment with, and for 28 days after, the enzyme inducing drug is stopped .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin decreases the exposure to dapsone. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   decreases   the exposure to   dapsone .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Darunavir boosted with ritonavir increases the exposure to rifabutin. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Darunavir   boosted with ritonavir   increases   the exposure to   rifabutin .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin is predicted to decrease the efficacy of desogestrel. For FSRH guidance, see Contraceptives, interactions.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   is predicted to   decrease   the efficacy of   desogestrel .  For FSRH guidance, see  Contraceptives, interactions .

hasDitaContent.@value: Rifabutin moderately decreases the exposure to doravirine. Manufacturer advises adjust doravirine or lamivudine with tenofovir disoproxil and doravirine dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Rifabutin   moderately   decreases   the exposure to   doravirine .  Manufacturer advises adjust  doravirine  or  lamivudine with tenofovir disoproxil and doravirine  dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Efavirenz slightly decreases the exposure to rifabutin. Manufacturer advises adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Efavirenz   slightly   decreases   the exposure to   rifabutin .  Manufacturer advises adjust dose .
